com.cloudera.director.spi.v1.model.util

Class DefaultLocalizationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.director.spi.v1.model.util.AbstractLocalizationContext
      • com.cloudera.director.spi.v1.model.util.DefaultLocalizationContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocalizationContext

    public class DefaultLocalizationContext
extends AbstractLocalizationContext
    Localization context that does not do any actual localization.

    • Method Detail

      • localize

        public String localize(String defaultValue,
              String... keySuffixComponents)
        Description copied from interface: LocalizationContext
        Returns a localized value for the specified localization key suffix components, or the specified default value if a localized value cannot be determined.
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - the default value to return if a localized value cannot be determined
        keySuffixComponents - the localization key suffix components
        Returns:
        a localized value for the specified localization key suffix components, or the specified default value if a localized value cannot be determined
